description: This file defines an interface (abstract class) named IController within the WPEFramework::PluginHost namespace. It declares several pure virtual methods related to system control operations such as Persist, Delete, Reboot, and configuration management.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An interface for controller operations in the WPEFramework plugin host, including methods for persistence, deletion, rebooting, and configuration management.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persists the current state or configuration.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a specified resource or path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves the environment variables or settings associated with the given index.

methods.name: Configuration
methods.description: Retrieves or sets the configuration for a specific callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Clones a configuration or resource from a base callsign to a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
